title: Capture Proof of Delivery (POD)
description: A carrier's driver has completed a delivery and needs to upload the signed Bill of Lading as Proof of Delivery.

tasks.description: Using a mobile app, the driver selects the shipment that was just delivered.
tasks.expected_outcome: Driver correctly identifies the shipment record.

tasks.description: The driver takes a picture of the signed BOL.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear image of the signed document is captured.

tasks.description: The driver uploads the image and captures the name of the signatory.
tasks.expected_outcome: The POD image and signatory name are successfully uploaded to the TMS.
